title: Linotype Block Gothic?
content:
I don’t this font ID’d so not sure if this is the right forum!

Anyway does anyone know if there’s a commercial release of Linotype Block Gothic?

Marc Jacob’s (fashion) use it for their ID and advertsing or something very close to it - but am I guessing this is custom?

Any help welcome. Thank you.

 [‹ Web Font Equivalent to Locator](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011704/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45330 "Go to previous forum topic") [Name of types s.XX ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011704/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45320 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Club-21

comments.content:
If the lettering at the top of [this page](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011704/http:/www.marcjacobs.com/) is what you are referring to, it looks like [Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011704/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/).

- Mike Yanega
